name: portfolio
description: My personal portfolio that includes a social feed and a blog powered by Evernote.

APP_LOGGER.description: Set to true to enable logging.

APP_SESSION_SECRET.description: Set to a whatever random and unique secret you want.

APP_EVERNOTE_BLOG_NOTEBOOK_GUID.description: Set to the Evernote notebook GUID for your blog notebook.

APP_EVERNOTE_BLOG_PUBLISHED_TAG_GUID.description: Set to the Evernote tag GUID that you will use to flag notes as published.

APP_EVERNOTE_SANDBOX.description: Set if you are using Evernote sandbox or not.

APP_MONGO_URL.description: Set to the mongo db connection string.

APP_TWITTER_SCREEN_NAME.description: Set to your twitter screen name.

APP_TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Set to your twitter consumer key.

APP_TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Set to your twitter consumer secret.

APP_TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Set to your twitter access token.

APP_TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Set to your twitter access token secret.

APP_FACEBOOK_APP_ID.description: Set to your facebook app ID.
